keyword: calories in a steak quesadilla from taco bell
title: Calories in a Taco Bell Steak Quesadilla
meta_description: Discover calories in a steak quesadilla from Taco Bell—510 kcal total, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, and tweaks for custom orders.
h1: Calories in a Taco Bell Steak Quesadilla
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell Steak Quesadilla with flour tortilla, grilled steak, three-cheese blend, and creamy jalapeño sauce; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check Taco Bell app or menu for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Taco Bell steak quesadilla provides 510 kcal and 27 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Taco Bell's info.

tweaks.label: Fresco style (no cheese or sauce, add pico de gallo)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Taco Bell steak quesadilla?
What's the protein in a steak quesadilla from Taco Bell?
faqs.a: About 27 g of protein per quesadilla.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Taco Bell steak quesadilla?
Are Taco Bell quesadillas high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 26 g total fat including 12 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie steak quesadilla at Taco Bell?
faqs.a: Opt for fresco style to reduce calories by about 150 kcal.
